name: PreventativeCareEncounterToScreenForForDiabetes
title: Preventative Care Encounter to Screen for for Diabetes
purpose: (Clinical Focus: Preventative care outpatient encounters for diabetes screening),(Data Element Scope: Allowable outpatient encounters for diabetes screening),(Inclusion Criteria: Annual wellness visits, outpatient visits, and outpatient preventative care),(Exclusion Criteria: None)
